channel.title: Help me please!
channel.description:
okay so i used to run servers on my old computer(win xp 32bit) and just the other day i got a brand new pc(vista ultimate 32bit).
the problem is that when i run my server, i can log on and everything but the the sites where you post the server says that it's offline.
ready for the messed up part? if i run the run.bat on this vista computer it starts up and i can logon, yet can't post a server on mopar because it says it's offline. yet when i run the copy of my source on the xp computer it says it's online but no1 can logon, i have portforwarded correctly i believe and have no-ip configured to this computer(vista) but idk how to make it so it says it's online when i run it on this computer(vista) please help.
thanks, =tyler=

item.title: Help me please!
item.dc:creator: @recker450 recker450
item.description:
@recker450 wrote:

try this sometime it happens to me too
login to your server with your ip
kill something or walk or talk
then relogin
now advertise on moparscape status not in these sections

Read full topic

item.title: Help me please!
item.dc:creator: @tyler28852 tyler28852
item.description:
@tyler28852 wrote:

i portforwarded and i have no-ip running, i can login, and i did change the client ip and everything, still nothing

Read full topic

item.title: Help me please!
item.dc:creator: @recker450 recker450
item.description:
@recker450 wrote:

did you portforward and have no-ip on?
if you did
then try to login then try to post it on mopar

Read full topic

item.title: Help me please!

item.description:
@tyler28852 wrote:

okay so i used to run servers on my old computer(win xp 32bit) and just the other day i got a brand new pc(vista ultimate 32bit).

the problem is that when i run my server, i can log on and everything but the the sites where you post the server says that it’s offline.
